note.p: American mechanical and civil engineer. Son of Thomas William Clarke (1834–95). Lived and worked in Hong Kong and New York City.
Massachusetts, town and vital records, 1620–1988 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 August 2014)
Reports of deaths of American citizens abroad, 1835–1974 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 February 2016)

National Archives and Records Administration (Washington D.C.) passport applications January 2, 1906 – March 31, 1925: certificates 170000–170375, 10 Feb 1920–11 Feb 1920 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 February 2016)
